title: Universal Deployment Strategy Schema Template
description: Universal template for documenting deployment strategies that works across any technology stack, infrastructure platform, or deployment methodology. This schema provides a structured approach to deployment strategy documentation using placeholders that can be adapted to cloud deployments, on-premise infrastructure, containerized applications, serverless functions, or any other deployment paradigm. Follows modern DevOps practices and deployment best practices for 2025.

strategyInfo.description: Basic deployment strategy information and metadata

iacTool.description: Infrastructure as Code tool - use placeholder [IAC_TOOL]

backup.description: Backup and disaster recovery using placeholders

monitoring.description: Deployment monitoring and observability using placeholders

deploymentMetrics.description: Key deployment metrics to track using placeholders
